VisitTime.PluginDescription: Reports the local time and the server time when your visitors view your website or app.
VisitTime.WidgetByDayOfWeekDocumentation: This graph shows the number of visits your website received on each day of the week.
VisitTime.WidgetLocalTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %s visitors' time zones %s during their visits.
VisitTime.WidgetServerTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %s server's time zone %s during the visits.
